events.name: Honor Local Veterans
text: The Town Council would like to honor our local Veterans. If you or a family member live in Mount Crawford and are a Veteran of the Armed Forces, please send the name and military branch along with your water bill payment or email: townofmountcrawford@gmail.com

events.name: 1825-2025 Bicentennial Celebration
text: The Town is forming a Historical Committee to help gather information for Main Street to become a Historic District as well as to prepare for the Bicentennial Celebration of Mount Crawford. If you would be interested in serving on this committee, or have photos you would be willing to have copied, or historic relics you would loan the town for the celebration, please call or text: (540) 421-0856 or email: townofmountcrawford@gmail.com

events.name: Public Notice ADOPTION OF CIGARETTE TAX
text: TOWN OF MOUNT CRAWFORD ADOPTION OF CIGARETTE TAX

The Town Council of Mount Crawford, Virginia gives notice of its intent to adopt a new ordinance of the Town of Mount Crawford Code, enacting a cigarette tax, at its regular meeting on September 9, 2024, beginning at 7:00 p.m. at the Town of Mount Crawford Municipal Building, 779 South Main Street, Mount Crawford, Virginia.

Pursuant to authority granted in Sections 58.1-3830 and 58.1-3832 of the Code of Virginia (1950), as amended, the proposed ordinance will enact a cigarette tax in the amount of up to $0.02 per cigarette sold
It is proposed this tax be effective January 1, 2025
The proposed ordinance is available for review in the Office of the Town Manager, 779 South Main Street, during regular business hours and on the town website: https://mountcrawford.us/
By order of the Mount Crawford Town Council 8/21, 8/28
